trans.title: Mass production body welding positions and numbers (Japan production models)

item.ptxt: Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
and : 2-Plate spot welding; and : 3-Plate spot welding; and : 4-Plate spot welding; : MAG plug welding; : MAG welding L=Welding length; unit: mm (in)

trans.title: Mass production body welding positions and numbers (Except Japan production models)

item.ptxt: Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
and : 2-Plate spot welding; and : 3-Plate spot welding; and : 4-Plate spot welding; : MAG plug welding; : MAG welding L=Welding length; unit: mm (in)

trans.ptxt: NOTE: This section explains the procedures after removal of all related parts. For the related parts' removal procedure, refer to the appropriate Shop Manual.

item.ptxt: Leave the front roof rail, roof arch A, and the rear roof rail to the body, and replace the roof panel.
Check the front roof rail, roof arch A, and the rear roof rail positions for damage. If necessary, replace them.

trans.ptxt: NOTE: This section explains the procedures after removal of all related parts. For the related parts' removal procedure, refer to the appropriate Shop Manual.

fig-text-grp.ptxt: Remove the roof arch A gussets and the rear roof rail mounting bolts from both sides, and drill the welded flange of the roof panel.
